it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.model

Class WeaponCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.model.Card
      • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.model.WeaponCard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cyberblade, ElectroScythe, Flamethrower, Furnace, GranadeLauncher, Heatseeker, Hellion, LockRifle, MachineGun, PlasmaGun, PowerGlove, Railgun, RocketLauncher, Shockwave, Shotgun, Sledgehammer, Thor, TractorBeam, VortexCannon, Whisper, Zx2

    public abstract class WeaponCard
extends Card
    This class implements the weapon cards of the game.
    Author:
    Giuseppe Italia

    • Method Detail

      • useWeapon

        public abstract void useWeapon(int typeOfAttack,
                               java.util.ArrayList<InvolvedPlayer> involvedPlayers)
        Handles the attack of a weapon card. Through a switch of if-else statement and according with the typeOfAttack calls the relative method of a weapon to complete the attack chosen by the player. Sometimes the switch statement is not required, for example when the weapon has only one effect.
        Parameters:
        typeOfAttack - Number of the effect of the weapon to use.
        involvedPlayers - List of object that contains player or/and square involved in the attack.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is generated if one element of typeOfAttack is not between 1 and 4

      • createWeaponCard

        public static WeaponCard createWeaponCard(int typeOfWeaponCard)
        Creates weapon cards according with the number passed by parameter.
        Parameters:
        typeOfWeaponCard - Number with which differentiate the typology of weapon card to create
        Returns:
        The weapon card generated
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is generated if typeOfWeaponCard is not between 0 and 20
